query_results.top_post: #Cocoa prices have collapsed... New York futures slumped to a fresh

Cocoa farmers from Sefwi Wiaso have arrived at the COCOBOD headquarters in buses to express their dissatisfaction with the recent reduction in cocoa prices due to the drop in global market rates. https://t.co/3aeiQ0uVUH

reason: Fed Policy Shock: HAWKISH_PIVOT - FOMC minutes released on February 18, 2026, delivered a hawkish surprise by revealing that several officials are open to additional interest rate hikes if inflation progress stalls. This narrative, described as a 'surprise shift,' caught markets off guard as investors had been pricing in rate cuts. The hawkish sentiment was reinforced by Fed Governor Michael Barr's warnings that AI-driven productivity gains might necessitate higher neutral interest rates.

payload.summary: FOMC minutes released on February 18, 2026, delivered a hawkish surprise by revealing that several officials are open to additional interest rate hikes if inflation progress stalls. This narrative, described as a 'surprise shift,' caught markets off guard as investors had been pricing in rate cuts. The hawkish sentiment was reinforced by Fed Governor Michael Barr's warnings that AI-driven productivity gains might necessitate higher neutral interest rates.
payload.market_impact: The US Dollar (DXY) strengthened significantly (up 0.6%), while commodities experienced a major sell-off, with gold plummeting between 11-18% and silver falling as much as 31%.
